table.name: communication_type
table.remarks: Code list of communication types. Used to identify the types of communication that can be used between the land administration agency and their clients. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the communication type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the communication type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the communication type

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the communication type.

table.name: Function: is_rightholder
table.remarks: Indicates if the party is associated to one or more land rights as a rightholder.

table.name: gender_type
table.remarks: Code list of gender types. Used to identify the gender of the party where the party represents an individual. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the gender type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the gender type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the gender type

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the gender type.

table.name: group_party
table.remarks: Groups any number of parties into a distinct entity. Implementation of the LADM LA_GroupParty class. Not used by SOLA Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History, Not Used

column.name: id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Identifier for the group party.

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The type of the group party. E.g. family, tribe, association, etc.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Identifies the all change records for the row in the group_party_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: group_party_type
table.remarks: Code list of group party type types. Implementation of the LADM LA_GroupPartyType class. Not used by SOLA. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object, Not Used

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code for the group party type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Displayed value of the group party type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the group party type

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Description of the group party type.

table.name: id_type
table.remarks: Code list of id types. Used to identify the types of id that can be used to verify the identity of an individual, group or organisation. E.g. nationalId, nationalPassport, driverLicense, etc. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the id type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the id type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the id type

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the id type.

table.name: party
table.remarks: An individual, group or organisation that is associated in some way with land office services. Implementation of the LADM LA_Party class. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Identifier for the party.

column.name: ext_id
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: An identifier for the party from some external system such as a customer relationship management (CRM) system.

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The type of the party. E.g. naturalPerson, nonNaturalPerson, etc.

column.name: name
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The first name(s) for the party or the group or organisation name.

column.name: last_name
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The last name for the party or blank for groups and organisations.

column.name: fathers_name
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The first name of the father for the party. Relevant where the fathers first name forms part of the name for the party.

column.name: fathers_last_name
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The last name of the father for the party. Relevant where the fathers last name forms part of the name for the party.

column.name: alias
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Any alias for the party. A party can have more than one alias. If so, the aliases should be separated by a comma.

column.name: gender_code
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Identifies the gender for the party. If the party is of type naturalPerson then a gender code must be specified.

column.name: address_id
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Identifier for the contact address of the party.

column.name: id_type_code
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Used to indicate the type of id used to verify the identity of the party.

column.name: id_number
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The number from the id used to verify the identity of the party.

column.name: email
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The party's contact email address.

column.name: mobile
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The party's contact mobile phone number.

column.name: phone
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The party's main contact phone number. I.e. landline.

column.name: fax
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The party's fax number.

column.name: preferred_communication_code
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Used to indicate the party's preferred means of communication with the land administration agency.

column.name: birth_date
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Date of birth.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Identifies the all change records for the row in the party_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: party_member
table.remarks: Identifies the parties belonging to a group party. Implementation of the LADM LA_PartyMember class. Not used by SOLA. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History, Not Used

column.name: party_id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Identifier for the party.

column.name: group_id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Identifier of the group party

column.name: share
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The share of a RRR held by a party member expressed as a fraction with a numerator and a denominator.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Identifies the all change records for the row in the party_member_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: party_role
table.remarks: Identifies the roles a party has in relation to the land office transactions and data. Implementation of the LADM LA_Party.role feild. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History

column.name: party_id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Identifier for the party.

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The type of role the party holds

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Identifies the all change records for the row in the party_role_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: party_role_type
table.remarks: Code list of party role types. Used to identify the types of role a party can have in relation to land office transactions and data. E.g. applicant, bank, lodgingAgent, etc. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the party role type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the party role type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the party role type

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the party role type.

table.name: party_type
table.remarks: Code list of party type types. Implementation of the LADM LA_PartyType class. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code for the party type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Displayed value of the party type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the party type

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Description of the party type.
